complements.label: complements
complements.description: Two concepts reciprocally complete one another without collapsing their distinctness.

supports.label: supports
supports.description: One concept stabilizes, enables, or strengthens the development of another.

converges_with.label: converges with
converges_with.description: Distinct symbolic or conceptual streams move toward shared meaning.

orients.label: orients
orients.description: A concept provides direction, telos, or organizing perspective for another.

illuminates.label: illuminates
illuminates.description: A concept clarifies or reveals dimensions of another concept.

precedes.label: precedes
precedes.description: A chapter or motif appears earlier in the narrative and prepares what follows.

culminates_in.label: culminates in
culminates_in.description: A trajectory reaches a decisive synthesis or endpoint in another concept.

symbolizes.label: symbolizes
symbolizes.description: A symbol concretely images a psychological process, structure, or totality.

opposes.label: opposes
opposes.description: Two concepts stand in productive tension or polarity.

develops_toward.label: develops toward
develops_toward.description: A concept matures in the direction of a broader or more integrated form.

relates_to.label: relates to
relates_to.description: Concepts are meaningfully associated without strict hierarchy.

integrates_into.label: integrates into
integrates_into.description: A previously differentiated element is assimilated into a larger whole.

manifests_as.label: manifests as
manifests_as.description: Latent psychic content appears in a specific experiential or symbolic form.

expresses_as.label: expresses as
expresses_as.description: A dynamic is outwardly expressed through a particular archetypal pattern.

symbolized_by.label: symbolized by
symbolized_by.description: A concept is represented through a recurring symbol.

structured_as.label: structured as
structured_as.description: A concept takes form according to a specific symbolic architecture.

achieved_through.label: achieved through
achieved_through.description: A state or goal is reached by means of a process.

requires.label: requires
requires.description: A process depends on another as a necessary condition.

resolved_by.label: resolved by
resolved_by.description: A psychological tension is worked through via another process.

completed_by.label: completed by
completed_by.description: An incomplete symbolic structure reaches wholeness through another element.

represents.label: represents
represents.description: A symbol or motif stands for a broader psychic reality.

enacts.label: enacts
enacts.description: An archetypal figure dramatizes or performs a process in narrative form.

guides_to.label: guides to
guides_to.description: A figure or idea directs movement toward a psychological objective.

aspect_of.label: aspect of
aspect_of.description: A concept expresses one dimension of a larger archetypal pattern.
